item.title: R and Python Together!
item.description: This is my first time using Python ever. Being introduced to it in this class allowed me the first opportunity to get a feeling for what my friends majoring in CS get to do! One of the first things we learned about was a way to make R and Python interact with eachother, using the reticulate package. First, we load the reticulate package and write our first message in R.
